As patients we have a lot of theories that have never been properly tested. You can see it all over the internet--people are taking their questions to social networks and forums everywhere.


We are the first community focused on finding evidence-based answers to the questions patients are asking right now. That's because Flaredown learns specifically about the things patients choose to track.



Are Lupus patients worried about stress? We'll learn exactly how much it affects Lupus disease activity on average. Are Fibromyalgia patients taking low dose naltrexone? We'll tell you how effective it is in the real world. We even plan to bring in researchers for in-depth studies and release reports to you on a special section of the site.


You can opt out your data and use Flaredown solely for tracking, but we hope you'll consider contributing. This is our bid for patient-first research, and we want you to be a part of it.


Learn about the details of our approach here: flaredown.com/data







Flaredown Is For All Chronic Conditions
We currently have specialized check-ins for Crohn's Disease and Rheumatoid Arthritis, and our primary concern after launch is to extend that to new illnesses rapidly. Here are some that we have in mind:AutoImmune and Inflammatory


Crohn's/Ulcerative Colitis/IBD
Rheumatoid/Reactive Arthritis

Lupus Erythematosus

Multiple Sclerosis
RSD/CRPS

Sjögren's Syndrome

Raynaud's

Psoriasis

Sarcoidosis

Type 1 Diabetes

Graves' Disease
Hashimoto's Thyroiditis
Addison's Disease
Myasthenia Gravis
Pernicious Anemia
Celiac Disease
Dermatomyositis and Polymyositis
Interstitial Cystitis
Ankylosing Spondylitis

Invisible Illnesses

ME/CFS

Fibromyalgia
Adrenal Fatigue
Chronic Pain
Chronic Migraines
Ehlers-Danlos/Hypermobility
Idiopathic Hypersomnia
Pyroluria
Gastroparesis
Endometriosis
Lyme Disease

POTS and Dysautonomia
Hypo and Hyperthyroidism
Food and Histamine Intolerance
Depression
Bipolar Disorder

...and many others.










Funding Breakdown
IndieGoGo funds will...

Let us hire our developers full time to complete the app
Cover server costs for the upcoming year of operation
Go toward IndieGoGo fees and taxes


Timeline

Closed beta (early access): February 2014Launch: May 2015
  
Risks & Challenges  We are developing Flaredown on our own time and money, so we need resources to pay for servers and keep our developer working full time on this project. This campaign will cover us for the first year of operation, and we will add a way to donate to the project once it is up and running. We will be very transparent about Flaredown's resources as it develops.


Get Involved


Share! We need your help to get the word out.

Bloggers: see our press page.

Mobile developers: help us extend to users on iOS, Android, and beyond.
Medical researchers and data scientists: talk to us about the data.

Involved in the patient community? We need advocates from different illnesses to help us understand and support each one the best we can. 
 Get in touch at contact@flaredown.com

story:
Lea and her son Julian need your help.


After hurricane Iselle ripped through Lea's  beautiful handbuilt Big Island Home , Lea and her son need your support to help rebuild some of the structures that were torn down by falling trees and heavy wind and rain. They live in an open air- natural built- structure, off grid in rural Kapoho on the East side of the Big Island, Hawaii which was hit really hard by the storm.


Luckily no one was harmed in the storm, but the family is now trapped on the land by large fallen trees which are blocking the road, and their shelter is now partially destroyed and healthy living conditions are compromised. 

 Many hours of chainsawing, landwork, clean up and restoration are necessary to make the place liveable again. 

Any amount of support to help rebuild their lives is sincerely appreciated.


Lea Mariposa is a wonderful musician and songwriter and is offering you a free CD with any donation of over $ 50.

story:
About this project

Nuvi was developed based on extensive brainwave experimentation and research. It is a “smart” sleeping aid system made for the modern age - practical and highly efficient.

 

 

 

Meet Nuvi

Nuvi is a smart sleeping mask embedded with a Bluetooth system. It integrates the slim speakers, lighting LED and an app to implement powerful sleep aid programs. 

 

7 SMART PROGRAMS

Nuvi has 7 smart programs, they are Easy Sleep, Smart Deep Sleep Booster (inside Easy Sleep program), Smart Wake Up, Lucid Dream, Power Nap, Light Energizer and Jet Lag Adjust program. All of the programs are operated via mobile phone app. 

Lucid Dream

Lucid Dream is requested by backers and created from stretch goal. It is based on the study, most of the dreams happen at the last stage before wake up. We set up a sequence of flashes red light to induce the lucid dream.

 

 

1. Easy Sleep

Our specifically composed Zen music mix with binaural beats and the dimming sound effect can truly soothe your mind effectively, lead you sleep onset quickly and bridge you to your deep sleep smoothly. For sure Nuvi also has the white noise for you to choose to block out the environmental interruptions, so you can not only fall asleep, but stay asleep.

 

2. Smart Deep Sleep Booster

Inside the Easy Sleep program there is a Smart Deep Sleep Booster program features with whispering Zen music and binuaral beats after the Easy Sleep program smartly induce your slow brain waves lead you enter the deep sleep again in the middle of your sleep.

 

3. Smart Wake Up

The smart alarm is designed to wake you up gently and naturally with the blue light and music from your light sleep phase. It takes you from sleep to wakefulness without usual grogginess, leaving you feeling much more refreshed. Moreover, it wakes you up but not disturbing your partner.

 

4. Lucid Dream

Inside the Smart Wake Up program, there is a Lucid Dream function which can be set in 2 hours time period to induce the lucid dream before wake up. You can enjoy the reality of the lucid dreams.Check this out you can know more about the details of LUCID DREAM

5. Power Nap

Long day at the office? Feeling exhausted? Try Nuvi’s POWER NAP function! Using only 30 minutes, it will allow you to recharge and wake up to a far more productive self.

 

6. Light Energizer

Mostly, if you are struggling with a.m. brain fog or having seasonal affective disorder or depression. Try LIGHT ENERGIZER!

You can wear the mask for 20 minutes with blue light to recharge your energy. It is able to lift your mood and help you feel more awake. Recent studies have demonstrated the better effectiveness of short wavelength blue light (approximately 460 nm) with better phase shifting properties when compared to the rest of the visible light spectrum. It improves alertness, diminishes and drowsiness.

 

7. Jet Lag Adjust

With its specially designed flashing blue light program, which can alleviate the negative effects of the jet lag.

 

Who is Nuvi for?

Nuvi is an excellent gadget for people who are long distance travelers, long working hour designers, night shift workers, insomnia sufferer and people who care their healthy lifestyle.

EEG Experiment and test

We did the EEG brain waves test at the Medical school by using Neurosky Mindwave EEG sensing technology, which is highly complied with Biopac system in clinical brain waves test.  

Before using the Nuvi, the tester was highly awaken with beta brain waves. See Brain waves picture A. 

After wearing Nuvi the Easy Sleep program with Zen music starts, which includes binaural beats. After 5 minutes the tester's brain waves quickly drop to low Alpha waves and afterwards change to slow Theta brain waves. See Brain waves picture B. 

That means Nuvi can highly clear the mind of the tester and help him fully relax and fall asleep easily. See brain waves picture C.

 

Product Comparison  

Technology should make complex things into simple and make our lives easier. We follow this golden rule and develop the Nuvi for practical use.

Note: Nuvi Easy Sleep Program has been tested by Neurosky Mindwave EEG Brain waves test to make sure it effectively induces people's slow brain waves and makes them feel sleepy.  

If you are looking for a practical sleep aid and jet lag adjusting device, then Nuvi is the best and affordable sleeping mask you deserve to have!

Nuvi improves your life style  

With Nuvi features app, you can improve your sleep quality and refresh your body easily. You can also apply it for daily Meditation and relaxation activities.

It supports Spotify, YouTube, iTunes etc. Bluetooth streaming programs individually. You can stream the music to Nuvi you like for your further enjoyment and spiritual nourishment.

Design Concept  

Beautiful designed in and out 

Nuvi design concept was inspired by the paraglider canopy. it has to give you the impression of flying high in the sky, cruising over the mountains, fields and beaches freely.

 

To develop the ideal sleeping mask, our team has gone through numerous prototypes in search of perfection.

What's inside?

We have integrated all of the electronic parts on printed circuit boards. There is no signal interference. The Bluetooth's system board, speakers, and LEDs have been integrated in an innovative way to fit into a relatively small silicone case. The result is a masterpiece of engineering on the inside and a masterpiece of design on the outside.  

 

Specifications  

Chipset: Bluetooth & BLE chipsets  

Battery: In normal use the battery last for 7 days before needing a recharge

Charging port: One micro USB port  

LED: 4 RGB LEDs 

Weight: Feather light ~80g

Speaker: 2x 30mm 0.3W slim speaker

Output S.P.L.: ~114dB  

Material: Lycra and memory foam

Descriptions  

Imagine drifting off to sleep in complete darkness with our favorite Zen music! Fully Adjustable Sleep Mask can also double as an Adjustable Headband with Speakers. Soft, integrated memory foam ear cushions for maximum, long lasting comfort. We've made the ear cushions as soft as we can for side sleeping comfort.  

This sleeping mask features large eye cavities, so the sleep mask lycra does not touch the eyes and lashes. There's no pressure when you're sleeping. More importantly, this helps when you enter your REM (Rapid Eye movement) stage of your sleep cycle, so your sleep uninterrupted, resulting in a more refreshing, natural sleep. You'll wake up feeling fantastic.

Its hi-tech molded design creates excellent light blockage for complete darkness, making it a must-have for sunny rooms and sleeping areas. 

The material is very light weight and the fabric breathes, leaving it cool on your face.  

The soft stretch band of the sleeping mask has perfect size variability and durability to surround your head comfortably.  

Slim speakers designed for fantastic HiFi stereo sound and bass.  

Perfect for long distance travel, airplanes, bus, car or home use.

Disclaimer: Nuvi is not a medical device. It is not designed to be a diagnostic tool, form of therapy, or clinical intervention of any kind. Consult your doctor for prevention, diagnosis and treatment of any medical issues.

 

Our Team

We are a small team full of enthusiasm for sharing our work and providing our backers, friends, and clients with a healthy life style.

Story  

A lot of my ex-colleagues and friends are frequent flyers. They suffer a lot from lack of sleep and jet lag issues. It took them weeks to recover, which impacted their normal life as well as their working performance. 

Coincidentally, in this March, we participated in Orange Fab Asia campaign as a guest where we met their Asia Chairman Mr. Wang who is a frequent flyer as well. He suggested us to create a smart lightweight sleep mask without a clumsy measuring device which would be easy to use. One that not only could help to sleep easily and would also adjust the jet lag at an affordable price. He deeply believed this mask could help lots of people. This matched with our primary idea that motivated us to come up with the solution as quickly as possible. 

To develop this ideal sleeping mask, our team not only studied countless online reviews, purchased many top selling sleep masks for studying but also did the prototypes for testing. It took us months of trying to implement the idea from sketch to prototype 1, 2 and 3. Finally, we came up the Nuvi, a simple sleep aid device that is easy to carry and operate and packed features that help you sleep, wake up and adjust your jet lag. 

Additionally, to prove Nuvi is working efficiently, we did the brain wave experiment and tested it in the medical school. The results were very impressive and showed it helps to relax and induces sleepiness by Zen music and binuarial beats. For the jet lag adjustment, we are following the study finds - the flashing blue light exposure could provide a fast and efficient method of preventing jet lags. We believe Nuvi will not only help long distance travelers but also assists more people with getting better sleep and improving their quality of live.

story:
This is Part II campaign of this Part I campaign https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-little-bidhan-for-his-blood-cancer-treatment/x/8396158 that was supported by everyone and re-launched second version due to Indiegogo’s time restriction of 60 days for Part I campaign.

We are making an attempt to support a life saving reason for a 3 Years 10 months child named Bidhan. He is suffering from Blood Cancer. Bidhan is getting his treatment at SGC Center & Research Institute, under the supervision of Dr CS Gupta.

His father, Mr. Balai Mahato is doing some small work and not able to bear the huge cost of treatment. Scanned copy of Doctor's letter along with reports and supportive documents attached. 

We have decided to provide all the possible financial support to his family for the treatment of Bidhan.

You may donate whatever you can contribute. We would be grateful for your support for this small child.Any help is appreciated, and no amount will go unnoticed.

Looking forward to whatever support you can provide.

"YOUR SMALL CONTRIBUTION WILL SAVE A LIFE".

story:
About this campaign

To give birth but not being able to see your newborn baby or growing child. To feel warmth but not being able to see the sunlight. As a child never have been out of the dark. With your donation of just 80 euros ($100) you will give the world to millions of cataract patients in Africa. 

Kimse Yok Mu has helped 27,000 people with cataract already. Now, the three foundations European Professional Network (EPN), Time to Help and Kimse Yok Mu work together on this social project. EPN will bring volunteer doctors to the areas to do the operations that costs 80 euros each. (Possible to donate less or more) Our current goal: make 350 cataract surgery.


Who are we? 
EPN is set up by visionary volunteer professionals in Belgium (Brussels).
Time to help is a charity foundation in Europe that operates all around the world. Its goal to help people in need of food, hygiene, health, education etc. has made the organization trustful over the years.  
Kimse Yok Mu? (Is there anyone?) is a charity operation that started in Turkey but operates all around the world to help people in need.

story: Sigma Chi and Alpha Omicron Pi are raising money for Wilson Disease Association. The family of a Sigma Chi member was recently affected by this disease and both Sigma Chi and Alpha Omicron Pi felt it was right to raise money for the Wilson Disease Association.
story_txt: Sigma Chi and Alpha Omicron Pi are raising money for Wilson Disease Association. The family of a Sigma Chi member was recently affected by this disease and both Sigma Chi and Alpha Omicron Pi felt it was right to raise money for the Wilson Disease Association.

story:
Short Summary

After being diagnosed with a rare form of brain cancer, Eidan would like to heal her soul through traveling across the USA in an RV. While doing so, she hopes to create a community of people throughout the country, who are willing to supply food, offer their kindness, and show love and support.

The donation will be for the cost of the RV. This RV, which will be designed with a #campingforthecure tagline, will be used for years to come for cancer patients who wish to take the same trip, despite financial difficulties. The RV can be reserved, for free, for 6 month time periods. 

While traveling, a website will be designed for families or individuals to become a part of this community. Anyone can sign up to be a "hot spot" on the U.S. map, becoming a place to stop for food refills, gas donations, or other necessary road trip essentials. For years to come, each time the RV is used for future travelers, these generous people will be on the website for the RVers to contact as support. 

Everyone can follow the RV adventure on Instagram, at @campingforthecure

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise money for the cost of an RV. With $25,000, we hope to buy a reliable used RV (less than 75,000 miles). This RV will be decorated with the tagline "#campingforthecure" and will be the start of a community across the US, consisting of individuals willing to donate food, gas money, or other RV travel necessities. 

Once the RV has been purchased, Eidan can begin her travel arrangements for the maiden voyage! During the planning process and all throughout the trip, we will create a website (Camping for the Cure) where families and individuals all over the U.S (and in Canada) can sign up to become a part of the community to help all future cancer patients taking the trip in this same RV. 

The Impact

This fundraiser for an RV purchase and the creation of a "Camping for the Cure" website will allow for other cancer patients to travel in this RV for years to come. This is an important fundraiser because cancer patients face inevitable medical financial burdens; however, along with medical care, it is so important to care for the heart and the soul. Traveling and nature can be healing agents all on their own and these individuals deserve the chance to escape for 6 months on a spiritual journey. 

Risks & Challenges

We understand that people signed up as "hot spots" for the RV journey won't necessarily be available to help out on every trip that is taken, so the "Camping for the Cure" website will be created in such a way that each traveler can contact hosts in the locations they hope to visit, and the hosts will have the ability to accept or decline each individual request.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Anyone can sign up as a "hot spot" for RVers to contact when they are planning their 6 month trip. If you are willing to donate food, gas money, etc during the road trips, you can visit our Facebook group "Camping for the Cure" to provide your name and information. This will become a more formal process once the RV has been purchased and the true website subsequently created.

This is an important fundraiser because cancer patients face inevitable medical financial burdens; however, along with medical care, it is so important to care for the heart and the soul. Traveling and nature can be healing agents all on their own and these individuals deserve the chance to escape for 6 months on a spiritual journey. 
    Risks & Challenges  We understand that people signed up as "hot spots" for the RV journey won't necessarily be available to help out on every trip that is taken, so the "Camping for the Cure" website will be created in such a way that each traveler can contact hosts in the locations they hope to visit, and the hosts will have the ability to accept or decline each individual request.   Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Anyone can sign up as a "hot spot" for RVers to contact when they are planning their 6 month trip. If you are willing to donate food, gas money, etc during the road trips, you can visit our Facebook group "Camping for the Cure" to provide your name and information. This will become a more formal process once the RV has been purchased and the true website subsequently created.

story:
Who am I?

Hi, I'm Jayden. I'm asking for your assistance to help me reach my goal of having top surgery. I'm a 21 year old Trans guy just trying to live my life.

What is top surgery?

Top surgery is a fancy name for having a double mastectomy with the final goal of creating a masculinzed chest.

More about me

I've been through a lot, and have since learned so much about myself. I was kicked out of my home shortly after I turned 18, and was forced to start rebuilding my life. I never had the opportunity to finish high school, but I managed to get my GED, and have since graduated from college. I currently work at the state psychiatric hospital where I work with individuals suffering from severe mental illnesses. In addition, I also volunteer at a local thrift store whose profits benefit homeless individuals and families.

I don't make a lot of money, but my passion is to help other people. I want to continue on my journey, and I know that I will be able to help more people the more comfortable I am with myself.

Surgery itself is a big and scary thing. However, I know that living in a body that doesn’t match the person that I identify as is an even bigger and scarier thing. It’s tough living in a body that doesn’t reflect me, and I’m asking for your assistance to help correct that


Cost breakdown:

$100: Initial consult fee

$500: Non-refundable deposit

$6000- $6900: Estimated surgery fee

$500: Additional costs (transportation, blood tests, other hospital fees)

 

Remember, even a dollar would help me out.

Thanks for everything!

 

Message me on facebook to learn more!

https://www.facebook.com/Xzandr.Jayden.Riley

 

And check out my etsy shop to learn more about some of my products! All profits go toward my surgery!

https://www.etsy.com/shop/jaydenriley

story:
Jordon is my beautiful cousin who is 20 years old and from Hull unfortunately she has a rare form of cancer (osteosarcoma) and is currently recovering from major surgery in New York and continuing her battle.

However her family are in Hull, this means it is hard for her family to support her like they would like too because of the added expense, it also means that Jordon has unexpected living expenses.

Every penny that is raised will be for Jordon to spend how she likes weather that is on her expenses or a flight ticket if she wants her dad or sisters to be able to visit her.

No matter how small or large the donation it will help to make this difficult time a little more comfortable.

Thank you for all your support Charley, Jordon and all the family xox

story:
Most of you know I was diagnosed with Stage 3 Papillary Thyroid Cancer in June of this year, at age 27 and went through RAI radiation treatment in July. It has been (and still is) a struggle emotionally and physically, but I will find out if I'm cancer-free in January. I really wanted to turn this negative situation into a POSITIVE one, because going into this situation, I was scared & knew very little about thyroid cancer or other thyroid-related issues. Please support Thyroid Cancer research, by donating to the cause, so that this can be a chance to educate people on how life-changing a thyroid issue can be!

The donations will be given to THYCA, Thyroid Cancer Survivors' Association, Inc. to support research & awareness for this life-changing condition.

In addition to this fund, I am also having a Thyroid Cancer benefit concert. The money raised for that, will also go to THYCA.
More info on the event can be found at the link below. Please consider joining us that night. The cover charge & money from the raffle prizes will all go to support THYCA.
https://www.facebook.com/events/416765055112599/

story:
***Recent News...The Local and Provincial government have given us permission to build a new medical facility next to the primary school and local government office. Pictures are now available.*** PLEASE HELP WHERE YOU CAN! 

I live on Don Det Island in the very southern point of Laos (It is labelled 4000 islands on the map provided). For so long I have organised emergency transport for visitors and Laotians who are in need of 1st class medical attention and medicine.

Our closest 24 hour medical centre is 3 hours away in Pakse.
Recently families and visitors have suffered and nearly lost loved ones;
2 months ago my brother in law's wife had complications with her first pregnancy. The local midwives were unable to help so at 2am, whilst having contractions, we had to rush to Pakse for professional help. It was incredibly painful and risky at that stage but we had no other option. The delivery was successful and their baby is healthy however the mother had to stay in the hospital alone for a week whilst my brother had to return home to work. 

Recently my long term German friend nearly lost his wife because there was no blood in the hospital's banks. Fortunately they were a blood match and had an on the spot blood transfusion to save her life.

And just yesterday (19/11) I helped a young Dutch couple with the 3 hour journey to hospital because they were very sick and feverish and there was nothing we could do for them here.
This is just a few examples of the many emergencies that have occurred recently.
It's time for a change in 2015.

Myself, family, and friends are hoping to start a project in January 2015 to build a modern medical centre, pharmacy, and blood donation centre. This facility will provide 1st rate care and medicine to the Laotians and the thousands of visitors we have each year. 

With your help we will be able to make this vital facility become a reality, which will create more promise and less suffering throughout the local area.

Breakdown of the budget;
$20,000 for the land (17m by 10m).
$40,000 for the main construction materials (sand, stone, cement, roofing, tiles, doors, windows, etc)
$5,000 for electricity (including back up generator) and filtered water installations.
$5,000 for beds and furnishings (desks, chairs, sofas, curtains, aircon units, etc)
$5,000 for construction wages (we also have volunteers ready to help).

***Please note that this is a non profit medical facility***

Once the construction is built we will have local sponsors and donors to pay electricity, water, and maintenance costs, as well as wages, training, food, and gasoline.

We will also make appeals to other medical facilities for equipment, support, and training.

Please help where you can and share our story with your family and friends.

All the best and thank you in advance.

Adam

story:
Introduction:

I am a man of 54 years old, a former biotechnologist, that turned later to web development. Now I want to use my acquired scientific, computer and social skills for this lobby campaign. Which I think is for the benefit of all mankind and not only for the elite. The idea behind this project is that aging of the human body is not considered a disease, but a normal process, has always been so, the way of the world, so since there is no disease there cannot be patents for cures, so the FDA says. But since there are now scientific insights for potential cures against the aging process, I want to lobby so that people think: OK there is a cure! So there must also be a disease (aging) pestering mankind! Lets tolerate longevity patented medication for everybody now!

There must come patents because otherwise no pharmaceutical company is going to do long term investments in research & development and marketing of longevity products, to protect their market and interests for lets say 20 years, the investments for such global marketed pharmaceuticals will be huge, however the potential profits are expected to be gargantuan.

Campaign description:

Lobby at the FDA

Lobby in scientific circles

Lobby at the pharmaceutical industries

Lobby in politics

Visiting institutions and congresses in person abroad, lobby by email, tweets and telephone.

Goal:

I hope this will bring the potential eternal life medication, for everybody affordable, during my lifetime. Moreover from Dutch death statistics one can conclude that with this potentially eternal life the estimated maximal life span is about 2,000 years before you die of "unnatural causes": A disease or accident etc.

Science:

I think that activating the promoter of the telomerase gene in every cell with gene therapy will do the trick. However I am open for criticism and suggestions for alternatives. But these kind of cures can not be patented in the USA, as I said before, because the FDA says: "Aging is not a disease!" But other medical experts say: "Cancer is not a fundamental problem anymore!". So I think this is true for all processes in the human cell. All that scientists need to do is gather and evaluate all information and turn that into a patented longevity medicine.

What we need & what you get:

I need funds to do the lobbying work and you get updates by blog on www.satoconor.com and by @galien8 daily tweets. And when I and my network succeeds also the affordable potential eternal life medication during your lifetime, delivered not by me directly but by your government and their medical institutions.

story:
The village of Nauta lies on the Itaya River, a tributary of the Amazon River. A Texas family started mission work here 14 years ago, and this year, I am going to be part of expanding it to include medical work, which is desperately needed in this remote area. Our medical work will include holding daily clinics, making home visits in the community of Nauta as well as visiting the Puerto Alegria orphanage. The orphanage was built about 2 hours from the village to give the street children a roof over their heads and relief from the crushing effects of extreme poverty. We will be visiting this orphanage to provide medical care and remind these kids that they are valued and cared for. There are 40 boys living there currently. The mission in Nauta has been able to help keep this orphanage open and keep food on the table to prevent these kids from being turned back out onto the streets.

The $3,000 is necessary to cover the cost of my airfare, food and lodging for this mission trip. I’ll make sure a charitable contribution receipt is mailed to you.

On behalf of myself, and Bless The Children African Mission, we say thank you for your kindness and generosity.

story:
Pictured from left to right:
Top Row:  Carl Larouche, Carson Rush, Matt Mocker, Cole Casl, Devin Blanchette, Matt Kernaghan, Rutger Gaillard, Connor Boyle, Sam Shepard, Will VonBrauchitsch, Ben Vaill
Middle:  Raif Harris, Sean MacDonald, Kevin Oricoli, Brendan MacDonald, Jason Ziegler, Kyle Mazza, Evan Uva,
Bottom:  Ryan Fleming (missing from photo Austin Allen)

On February 15, 2015, our Bantam A Youth Hockey Team won the Connecticut Tier 2 State Championship and will now represent Connecticut in the USA Hockey National Tournament in Salt Lake City Utah, March 26-30.

All associated costs (travel, lodging, practice ice) are paid by the players, and are anticipated to cost over $60K for the team and coaches to attend.  Our first priority is to ensure that all our team members are able to participate. We have played 65 games to date this hockey season, with 50 wins, 9 losses, and 6 ties!

The boys will be working diligently over the next five weeks to raise money through community events, however, we still need help. Family, friends, fans—please consider a small donation to help offset some costs as we set off to capture the National Title! 

Our boys appreciate your support.

story:
Wonder Squat is the World's First Smart Squat machine for anyone who likes to squat.


 

Easy Squat 

 

And, It is smart

The App with build in instruction video, 100 days exercise plan, and will record your daily exercises effort. 

 

 

 

The squat is the king of exercises for a reason. 
The legs are the biggest muscles in your body and doing squats raises your testosterone levels drastically.  
These compound movements hit more than one muscle and the more fibers you stress during an exercise the more testosterone will be released into the bloodstream. 
Squatting has direct benefits for those calf, leg, and butt muscles that you need to stretch, flex, and tone to tighten and strengthen up your booty. 
You not only get toned and beautiful legs but also boost healthy hormone production in the body.

The knees are not at 90 degrees with your leg. 
This could be a result of low mobility/flexibility. Nevertheless, this is the number one cause of knee injury.  
Additionally, the squat requires exceptional form, style and technique—learned through years of experience. 
The Wonder Squat helps you maintain good form when you are squatting so that your knees stay healthy, and your legs strong.

 

 

 

Strong legs, strong life.  If you want strong legs, you need to Squat.  
But, Research reveals that 86% people don’t know how to Squat correctly. 
Squats are also known to cause injuries with the number 1 reason being—bad form. 
Additionally, 60% of beginners do not have the strength to Squat.  
In order to help people squat correctly without any injuries while keeping all the benefits—we created the Wonder Squat. 

 

 

 

Twice Effective:

Our patented Resistance makes you sit slowly, but provides the force necessary for the push to stand up. This feature is great for beginners, who need leg strength.

No injuries

The patented Wonder Squat design always keeps your feet at 90 degrees with your legs. This means that you can maintain good form, strengthen your legs and reach your fitness goals with a lower risk of  injuries. 

 


What makes the Wonder Squat so effective?

 

Patent Resistance design

We all know that free-weights are great and can cause a lot of joint pain. Resistance bands are known to produce progressive resistance, which means that your muscles are not completely activated throughout the movement.

Wonder Squat works with gravity and your bodyweight.
You can easily do a light cardio workout with just one single exercise. 
Additionally, you can also use the Wonder Squat for a wider range of functional exercises like pushups and dips. The Wonder Squat only weighs (please add weight)

The Wonder Squat makes squatting easier for people whose legs are not strong enough. 
The spring does that job and was designed to add that little support at the bottom of the squat—helping you keeping you injury free while giving you those toned legs.

Whether you are a beginner or an athlete, someone who wants toned sexy legs, great Buns and Thighs, or for you guys who want to improve the strength and size of your muscles, and also help enhance your core strength and balance, as well as improve flexibility.. Wonder Squat is for you!

​

 

In the comfort of your home          
Workout in your office, take a little 5 minute break

Morning, Afternoon, Evening
While you are watching TV
Taking a break from the computer

 

 

Our Team

Inventor: Ms Alin, an ex sailing athlete,  and a trainer currently. Invented Wonder Squat during trainer life. 

Reliable manufacturer : Seeway . Who is focusing on developing new products with inventors to bring new ideas to life. Also a team of engineers. 

We believe that no problem is too small to tackle, and no challenge is too big to overcome.We dream big, yet our products are simple.
From here things are made to be of benefit to all humankind.

Question on Wonder Squat, please contact: support@wondersquat.com

For distributors, please contact simon@seewayinc.com 

Ms Alin

Seeway Industrial

 

Time Line

 

What will happen in 100 days, if you do 100 squat per day? 
Let us try and find out together!

Reward

Risks & Challenges

The tooling for Wonder Squat are ready. The small run production test were finished. The quality control result was great. So, we don’t see any issue will be risk now. 

We will ship the pilot test backers once the campaign finished on June 2019. 

All the other backers will be sending on Sep. 2019

In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until we correct the issue.

story:
A 31-year-old policeman from Victoria was shot in the back of the head after he and his partner tried to pull over a car in Moonee Ponds about 3:40am.

The officer suffered shotgun pellet wounds to the back of his head, but remains in a conscious but stable condition in hospital.

We at Cop Humour Australia will be sending the officers involved a 'Care Package' on behalf of the extended CHA Family.

If you wish to contribute to this Care Package, feel free to donate through this crowdfunding campaign. All donations will be put towards items and gifts for the officers.

More details on the story can be found here: http://mobile.abc.net.au/news/2015-07-07/underw...

We at Cop Humour Australia will be sending the officers involved a 'Care Package' on behalf of the extended CHA Family. story:
From our beginnings in New Zealand, Skinnies is taking its innovative waterless gel range of sun-care products and changing the way people enjoy the sunshine. Launching in the USA, Skinnies is a Sunscreen Revolution, set to change the way Americans view & use sunscreen. No longer do you need to slop on or feel coated in white and greasy ‘block’.

 Here’s the INNY on Skinnies:

Operating under the philosophy of zero water for zero waste of the planet’s most precious resource, Skinnies is committed to the environment and devoted to building the best sun care brand in the world to keep consumers safe in the sunshine.

All you need to remember is - a little goes a long way!

An eco-spirited brand, the Skinnies philosophy is minimal ingredients for maximum efficacy to protect both people and the environment. 

Skinnies Sungel SPF 30 is a unique lightweight broad-spectrum formulation that is made without water and contains ingredients that won't cause irritation to your skin. Designed for use on the face and body, Skinnies Sungel SPF30 uses advanced Organogel to create a layer that bonds to the top of your skin so the sunscreen filters stay in place.

 

Skinnies CONQUER SPF 40+ is an ultra-water resistant, high performance sunscreen for action sports and activities. Based on the iconic Skinnies Sungel SPF 30, Skinnies CONQUER takes things up a notch. Designed for use on the face and body and to handle the harshest elements of sun, snow and water sport conditions, Skinnies CONQUER SPF 40+ is also formulated with advanced Organogel to create a layer that bonds to the top of your skin without evaporating or being washed away. Because of this, Skinnies CONQUER doesn't sweat, run into or sting your eyes.

 

 

Don't believe us? Watch!

 

 

So how does Skinnies work?

 

 

PEOPLE LOVE SKINNIES!

For ALL skin types

Hear it from our fans...

 

OUR HERITAGE

 

MEET THE TEAM

 

 

 

FOLLOW SKINNIES ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Don’t forget to sign up for our emails and like & follow us on social media to keep up with all Skinnies USA information, and if you have any questions or ideas feel free to contact us at hello@gotskinnies.com!

 

FAQ's

What is Skinnies?

Skinnies is a sunscreen revolution. Skinnies waterless organogel technology means it goes on clear, dries fast, isn’t white or greasy and feels amazing on your skin. #sunscreenrevolution

No water, so what....

Normal sunscreens contain 50-70% water (which doesn’t protect you from the sunshine!). Having water as the main ingredient in sunscreen means you have to slop lots on, it’s white and greasy, you have to wait 15-20 minutes for the water to evaporate and you need to reapply often.

Skinnies is not diluted with water so it’s like a concentrate. A little goes a long way.

The organogel forms a thin layer on top of your skin holding the UV filters in place so Skinnies does what it should, where it should. There’s no wait time for dry down or evaporation. It provides instant broad spectrum UV protection.

Bonus fact: Skinnies doesn’t freeze at altitude coz there’s no water innit so it’s COOL snow bunnies #faceshots

How do you use it?

Use Skinnies thoroughly and sparingly for instant long lasting UV protection. A pea size blob will cover your face, neck and ears.

The industry recommended amount of normal sunscreen for your whole body is a shot glass (30ml). For Skinnies you use a teaspoon amount (around 6ml) so you use 5 times less than typical sunscreens!

Check the water resistance rating and reapply if you’re in the water for extended periods or if you towel dry yourself.

Bonus fact: rolling around in the sand is like an exfoliating treatment so make sure to reapply!

What’s in it?

Skinnies is made with minimal ingredients for maximum efficacy. All ingredients rate well on EWG and Paula’s Choice. There are no ingredients of animal origin so it’s safe for vegans.

Product specific ingredients are listed below and any questions feel free to get in touch at

hello@gotskinnies.com

We’re an environmentally friendly lot at Skinnies and encourage you to be as well. There are many ways our oceans are polluted and impacted, not least by rubbish & plastic, run off, emission and global warming raising the ocean temperature. This temperature change and rubbish causes most of the damage to coral reefs in our precious oceans.

Bonus fact: Martha Van Arts, Skinnies Co-founder has a Masters in Environmental Engineering which means she’s super keen on Skinnies products being effective, efficient and environmentally friendly.

What’s not in it?

Skinnies does not contain: water, parabens, preservatives, alcohol, thickeners, emulsifiers, nano- particles, fragrances, mineral or paraffin oil, di-methicone or silicones.

Is Skinnies good for sensitive skin and babies, and what about people with acne or eczema?

By removing the water we’ve eliminated a lot of ingredients that cause skin irritation and Skinnies is non-comedogenic!

We use Skinnies on our own babies, over their eczema and a lot of people tell us they can use Skinnies when they react to other sunscreens. We always recommend a patch test for sensitive skin types and especially for little people!

Skinnies is suitable for pregnant women and babies.

Bonus fact: Kids adapt faster than adults to using less sunscreen.

Is it natural?

Skinnies range of products are made with natural ingredients but are not 100% natural.

Is Skinnies tested on animals?

Absolutely not. For the record, we test on humans who are both willing and happy about it!

Bonus fact: when water resistance is tested, the people sit in a warm spa pool for up to 4 hours....mmmm......wonder what they talk about...

Is Skinnies tested to make sure it works?

Skinnies complies with all U.S. FDA regulations for sunscreen.

Skinnies is independently tested for SPF efficacy, broad spectrum and water resistance by Eurofins.

We’ve had Skinnies tested extensively to make sure it does what the tube claims.

Bonus fact: Olly Van Arts, Co-founder of Skinnies prides himself on personally testing every batch of Skinnies (including LOOKS!)

Where is Skinnies produced?

Skinnies is designed in New Zealand under the harshest sun conditions in the world and made in 2 global locations.

In the USA, Skinnies is made in Dallas, Texas in a USFDA certified facility.

Bonus fact: The chemistry behind the organogel sunscreen is complex and the first of it’s kind in the US!

Is Skinnies a friend of the environment?

Heck yeah! We don’t use water in our products, as we believe it’s one of the planet’s most precious resources. Skinnies donates to water charities and melanoma foundations around the world.

We manufacture Skinnies as close as possible to the market where it’s sold to keep our carbon footprint to more of a carbon toe print.

Packaging is minimal and recyclable. Ingredients are biodegradable.

We encourage Skinnies fans to be conscious of pollution, emissions and water use.

Bonus fact: we LOVE answering questions about Skinnies. 

SKINNIES PRODUCT RANGE – USA

Skinnies Sungel, Sunscreen, Broad Spectrum SPF 30, Water Resistant (40 minutes), UVA/UVB Organogel Protection

Everyday lifestyle product

Important Information:

Actives ingredients: Avobenzone 3%, Homosalate 15%, Octisalate 3%, Octocrylene 10%

Inactive ingredients: Bentonite, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Diisopropyl Adipate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Polytetrafluoroethylene, Propylene Carbonate, Silica, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triacontanyl PVP

Safety Warning

For external use only Do not use on damaged or broken skin When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

Directions

Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure reapply: after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating immediately after towel drying at least every 2 hours Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum value of SPF 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m. wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctorOther information protect this product from excessive heat and direct sun may stain some fabrics. Questions or comments?  Email Skinnies at hello@gotskinnies.com. www.gotskinnies.com

Skinnies CONQUER Performance Sungel, Sunscreen, Broad Spectrum SPF 40+,Ultra Water Resistant, Water Resistance (80 minutes), UVA/UVB Organogel Protection

Pro protection for extreme and water activities

Important Information:

Actives ingredients: Octocrylene 10%, Homosalate 15%, Octisalate 5%, Zinc Oxide 3%

Inactive ingredients: Beeswax, Bentonite, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Diisopropyl Adipate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Propylene Carbonate, Polytetrafluoroethylene, Silica, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triacontanyl PVP

Safety Warning

For external use only Do not use on damaged or broken skin When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

Directions

Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure reapply: after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating immediately after towel drying at least every 2 hours Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum value of SPF 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m. wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctorOther information protect this product from excessive heat and direct sun may stain some fabrics. Questions or comments?  Email Skinnies at hello@gotskinnies.com. www.gotskinnies.com

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Email us at hello@gotskinnies.com

For inquiries regarding Distribution, Retail and Partnerships please contact us via email at hello@gotskinnies.com

Media contact:

Rachel Gonzalez

The Lane Communications Group

rgonzalez@thelcgroup.com

212.757.6880

THANK YOU FOR LEARNING ABOUT SKINNIES!

story:
WE GOT THE BUILDING! 

                       BUT NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

                            REAL CHANGE FITNESS

Real Change Fitness grew from one woman's passion for fitness and desire to help others.

 Coach RC is a former 3 sport college athlete hailing from Virginia Union University and has coached high school basketball combines in the Virginia area. After receiving her bachelors from Savannah State University and  spending sometime as a juvenile corrections officer she realized that as a mother of 3 her extreme passion for women's health and fitness never changed. Standing at 5'10 weighing a solid 160 lbs Coach RC is a certified fitness trainer who's on a mission to help other women live healthier lifestyles.

     

   

 Real Change Fitness is a MOVEMENT! 

The company was designed with the everyday woman in mind. Coach RC is out to get moms in shape...and not the "I have more energy" shape...but the "I haven't looked and felt like this since I was in my 20's" shape.

Not only that but,

She is also an advocate for the awareness of childhood obesity, and is out to get kids active, through the FIT KID MOVEMENT. This movement will allow for a group of students to come to the facility for 2 hours after school. The first hour will be used for the students to complete their homework, receive tutoring, and have a healthy snack. The second hour students will be getting active!       


What Sets REAL CHANGE FITNESS apart?

This Facility Will Offer:

  • Beginner, Intermediate, and Advance Small Group Fitness Classes
  • Exotic Fitness Classes.
  • Mommy & Me Fitness Classes For New Mothers.
  • The FIT KID Movement: -Includes 1 hour of homework and tutoring, as well as 1 hour of Fitness! 
  • Fitness, Health & Wellness Seminars for Women.
  • On site supervised play areas for infants, toddlers, and older children while the mother exercises.
  • Clothing and Canned Good Drives to support local shelters. 

                                                   


            SOUNDS GREAT! 

 WHERE'S MY MONEY GOING?

Okay Guys, Here's The Breakdown:

  • Facility Rental
  • Staff
  • Furnishings
  • Equipment
  • After School Transportation: Fit Kids Movement 
  • Advertising
  • Misc Associated Expenses 


The Impact

The impact on the community would be PHENOMENAL! No longer would moms be discouraged from getting the physical fitness help they desire, all because they cannot find or afford child supervision for or during a workout. IT STOPS NOW!  
As a mother Coach RC understands the extreme importance of safety. All supervision will be monitored by CDA and CPR Certified employees who pass both background check and drug screening. 
There is serious need for a change in the fitness environment in Convington, GA. Coach RC and REAL CHANGE FITNESS are out to fix it! 


Risks & Challenges

The challenge is that there are other gyms and fitness centers in the area. However, there are none that offer child supervision; and for an affordable price. Real Change Fitness is out to set a new standard in the fitness industry.  We have the keys, we just need your support to get us going!

FAQs

How much can I contribute?

Any and all forms of contribution are GREATLY appreciated. 

Not sure what amount?

REAL CHANGE FITNESS  has offered some pretty great incentives for your support! 

Check Them Out!!!

"I’m excited about what REAL CHANGE FITNESS represents. What else can I do?"

You can help us by joining the campaign! 

Share us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RealCFitness/

If you'd like to sponsor an item. For more information please contact Coach RC via: RealCFitness@gmail.com

When do you plan to Open?

Grand Opening is set for MAY 1st, 2016

How can I contact you?

You can contact us at RealCFitness@gmail.com and see more of us on our website! WWW.REALCHANGEFITNESS.NET

Also Follow Our Social Media Platforms!

INSTAGRAM:  _RC_FITNESS

FACEBOOK : WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/REALCFITNESS/


Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us by joining the campaign! 

Share us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RealCFitness/
Repost our pics on Instagram!!  @_RC_FITNESS

story:
What Are We Raising Money For?

The Excellence Training Academy is an online program that provides emotional, psychological, physical, nutritional wellness, and success training and guidance.

We are currently focusing on the development of Live Longer, Live Healthier, an innovative disease fighting wellness program. Its purpose will be to reduce stress, defeat negative mind-states, and increase vitality, therefore boosting the immune system. The program is from the culmination of over 40 years of experimentation, and practical application, and will be based on a field of medicine known as psychoneuroimmunology, and the ETA team’s Dr. Al Barrios (Psychologist, and winner of the first annual National Cancer Federation’s Award in Psychoneuroimmunology) will be speerheading this particular program. And in honor of the significant impact Dr. Barrios has made working with cancer patients, we would like to donate part of the funds we raise here directly to Cancer Research.

We are asking for your help to boost the creation of Live Longer, Live Healthier, & ETA Online Program, Turning our digital library of material into books, workbooks, dvd’s, cd’s, and a magazine, allowing us to reach out to more people, and in continuing to create great programs like this one.

The Live Longer, Live Healthier Program

Studies in psychoneuroimmunology have shown that depression and chronic stress increase the risk of the initiation or progression of many serious diseases, in fact it is the basic cause of 60% of all human illness. And 77% of Americans regularly experience physical symptoms of stress.

Chronic stress can lead to premature aging, skin problems, physical pain, infertility, high blood pressure, shorter life span, and susceptibility to infection of any number of diseases. This program will be designed to help us all combat and prevent the negative effects of stress, using visualization, meditation, fitness exercises, and positive psychology.

Here is the basic premise:

The body has a natural defense against disease- the immune system. Negative states of mind (anger, resentment, hopelessness) can suppress the immune system (i.e. stress hormone corticosteroid lowers lymphocyte white blood cells). If you remove these negative mind states the immune system will revive, and reject the disease more easily.

And no, we’re not simply talking about “Imagining your cancer away”, nor are we implying in any way that all people get diseases because they “think wrong”. This is not a miracle cure we are claiming here, we’re talking about naturally boosting the immune system- making your body better able to fight all diseases.

NOTE: When suffering from serious illness and disease this program should be used in combination with treatment recommended by your Doctor, not in replacement of.

Psychoneuroimmunology is a well respected science with a rich history. For more information and recent news Click Here

For more information on Dr. Al Barrios (Winner of the National Cancer Federation Award for Psychoneuroimmunology & Nominated for the Norman Cousins Award in Mind-Body Health): Click here

Excerpt from Dr. Barrios' Book: Towards Greater Freedom & Happiness: Click Here         

What We Need:

Our aim is $15,000, which will be a great start, but the number of people we are able to reach, new software & programs we are able to develop, and industry experts we can involve will continue to grow with the more funds that we raise. 

Please donate if you have the means to do so. You are helping a hard working, dedicated group of people create a great program.

If you don’t have the means to donate, then if you could please spread the word about this Indiegogo Project to your family, friends, and business contacts. Here are a few simple ways to help us out: (Links are provided just below the video)

-       Like us on Facebook

-       Share us on Facebook.

-       Tweet it on Twitter

-       Share it on Google +

-       Email the link

We would truly appreciate it!!

 Who We Are:

The Excellence Training Academy Online Program features time-tested strategies and techniques from our over 60 years of industry experience. The ETA team includes a number of talented professionals including: Chris Munce, who is the President & Founder of the Excellence Training Academy, a Performance Enhancement Specialist, Inventor, Coach & Trainer, Certified Massage Practitioner, and Upcoming Author. Psychologist Dr. Al Barrios, Registered Dietician Noelle Tourney, and Pilates Contrology Instructor Cecelia Mchugh.

This team has already been instrumental in healing multitude of ailments such as High Blood Pressure, Obesity, Arthritis, Scoliosis, Tendinitis, Depression, Anxiety, Obesity, Smoking and Alcoholism, Heart Disease, and yes even Cancer. Check out some of our many testimonials Click Here.

Parts of program have been implemented by some of the largest organizations in the world, such as the American Cancer Association, American Heart Association, U.S. Army, U.S. Navy, U.S Airforce, NYPD, and more.

For more information on the ETA President and Founder Chris Munce: Click Here 

How We Will Show Our Appreciation to You:

When you fund this initiative, you will receive Exclusive Access to the ETA Online Program and as much value as we possibly can. Look to the right of this page for detailed information on the great perks we have for you.

*1-to-1 Coaching Sessions can be for both Success Training, and for Helping Combat & the Prevention of Disease*

Here are a few samples of material from the ETA Program for you to check out (right click and save as): 

The Concentration Spiral - Click Here

The Productivity Planner - Click Here

The Relaxation Place - Click Here

 

If We Stretch Our Goals: 

If We Raise $15 000:

Your participation within the ETA would allow us to create the Cancer Fighting Immune Boosting Program and help us make all our content into the form of hardcover and softcover books, magazines, and integrated dvd’s. Plus, we will Donate 5% of the Total Funds received to Cancer Research.

If We Raise $30 000:

It will allow us to create the previous level and a mobile & web-based application that can help you bring positive change even easier with greater convenience into your life. Plus, we will Donate 8% of the Total Funds received to Cancer Research.

If We Raise $45 000:

It would allow us to create the previous levels and an extensive forum community that would enhance the social connection and rapport between people within the ETA Program. Plus, we will Donate 12% of the Total Funds received to Cancer Research.

If We Raise $60 000:

It would allow us to create all the previous levels and to upgrade all our websites with custom software and make them even more user friendly. Plus, we will Donate 16% of the Total Funds received to Cancer Research.

If We Raise $75 000:

It would allow us to create all the previous levels and we would be able to bring more industry experts into this program, and increase our reach towards helping others. Plus, we will Donate 20% of the Total Funds received to Cancer Research.

Thank You!

We would like to extend our thanks for taking an interest in our program, and we wish you the very best throughout your life.

Sincerely,

Chris Munce, Dr. Al Barrios, and the Excellence Training Academy Team

story:
Short Summary

Sadly, in the United States, health care has become big business. Consumers control virtually every other sector of the U.S. economy, but health care is controlled by third-parties and giant, powerful companies who wield enormous influence in Washington D.C. Our company is on a mission to fundamentally change the entire health care payment system --and dramatically decrease costs in the process. If you are fed up with the current system and the lack of answers for why U.S. health care is so expensive, you've come to the right place. We have the solution. Thank you for donating generously.

 

The Impact

The problem with the U.S. health care system is best described by two world-renowned economists, Rosemary Gibson and Janardan Prasad Singh:

“The intrinstic value of healing, rooted in science and ethics, has been forsaken. In its place, the momentary glee of a rising stock price or a giant royalty payment has forever changed what was once a mission. It became a business. Now it is a racket. This is the corruption of a human enterprise that should be the noblest of them all, and it lies at the heart of where American-style health care went wrong.” Source: www.battleoverhealthcare.org.

At Solarte Health we are on a mission to take back the health care system in the United States--and lower costs. Consumers control virtually every other sector of the U.S. economy. Health care is the only industry in which giant, powerful companies have managed to convince consumers they have no power. But the truth is consumers do have a powerful voice in the health care conversation, and we’re about to amplify it.

Solarte Health is creating an authentically “consumer driven” marketplace, one in which consumers have freedom to choose both their health care providers and the cost of the health care services and products they purchase. We’re developing apps for their cell phones and digital technology  that will allow them to shop for the best values. For instance, when faced with the option of paying $4,600 for a colonoscopy vs. $800 for the exact same test at a different location, consumers will have the freedom to purchase the best value—saving both themselves and their employers money. This competition will drive costs down throughout the system—providing substantial savings for both employers and consumers-- for years to come.

Many other start-ups in the healthcare space use words that sound like they will bring costs down, but in reality most of these services only add to the cost by making people (and companies) think they need unnecessary services, such as reporting.

Ours is the only company in the healthcare space that is fundamentally going to change the way consumers purchase health care in the United States. We project substantial savings for both employers and employees from day one of implementation. But we need your help to get there.

You and I, and the rest of the U.S., can solve the problem of out-of-control health care spending together. Thank you for joining us in taking on the giants by donating generously to this cause.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

unable to donate? no worries, you can still contribute:

  • Get the word out about the campaign 
  • Post a link to our campaign on your social media sites

story:
My name is Stacie Van Brandenburg and I am 23 years old. When I was 12 years old, my life was radically changed by a single bite of a tick. Thousands of people every year become infected with the Borrelia Burgdorferi bacteria, better known as Lyme disease. Many people are lucky and the disease is detected in its early stages, where it can be treated effectively. Others are not so lucky, living with the bacteria in their bodies for months, even years before a symptom appears.

The illnesses and conditions I developed from the bacteria affect my everyday life and are often debilitating. Over the years, doctors have diagnosed me with everything from Lyme arthritis, fibromyalgia, neurological symptoms such as “brain fog” but worst of all, excessive daytime sleepiness, chronic fatigue syndrome and narcolepsy. Within the past few months, it was discovered that a second tick bit me, infecting me not only with Lyme disease but also Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever, another tick-borne illness. I’ve lost count of how many antibiotics, medications and therapies I have tried over the years, all of which have been largely unsuccessful. With my father on permanent disability and my mother working two jobs, the cost of medical expenses has had a significant impact on our family. I began to lose hope of ever being able to live a somewhat “normal”, healthier life but deep down inside, I knew I was not ready to end the fight.

Recently, I learned about a treatment called “whole body hyperthermia”. The treatment is not offered anywhere in North America but is performed in Germany for patients fighting Lyme disease. This is not just another treatment, another antibiotic I would take and hope that it works. This treatment kills the bacteria causing Lyme plus co-infections a tick can transmit, significantly improving a patient’s physical, mental, and emotional well-being each and everyday. Most significantly, it’s effective in 100% of patients -- even in those who have tried everything and have had Lyme disease for years. I now have a once-in-a-lifetime chance to become healthier by receiving an advanced, state of the art treatment in Germany. For me, the outcome to be gained significantly outweighs the potential side effects.

The only obstacle that stands between me and my health is raising the money I need for the treatment. Your donation will go towards the $40K I need to travel to Germany to undergo whole body hyperthermia. This will cover the treatment itself (which costs about €1,000 EUR/$1,300 USD per day) for three weeks, medications & supplements, and traveling expenses. Whether or not my goal is reached, any and all funds will go towards the treatment I need to get better. Along the way, you can follow me through my journey by reading my blog, www.fightlyme.org, to living a healthier life before, during and after my treatment.

My goal from this treatment is not only to be Lyme-free but to be able to share my story. While my story has been extremely personal and difficult to talk about, there are thousands of other people who have their own story and millions more are at risk. It is essential to bring attention to the need of educating the public about this growing epidemic. Spreading awareness by publicizing my story, I feel, is the greatest contribution I can give. Helping others, I believe can be some of the best medicine.

While Lyme disease I feel has impacted my life negatively, I try to look at the positives that have come from fighting a chronic illness. Through hospitalizations, surgeries and treatments, I graduated from Syracuse University with my B.S. in Public Health, teaching me about the tools and resources that have been successful in being an advocate for my health. More importantly, I followed my passion in learning how to help educate the public about many illnesses, not only Lyme disease. However, if I can prevent any individual from going through what I’ve gone through, would make the struggle of getting through school that much more worth it.

story:
Let us come together to help those who are in need of love and generosity. Anyone can donate, it's fast and easy.  It goes diectly to the Red Cross and to those who have lost everything in Hurricane Sandy. This is a great way to see what a community can do when they come together as one!

My goal is to raise enough money to help those in need start rebuilding their lives.  So many have lost everything and are left with nothing.  My hope is to reach out to our friends, family and communities to help us reach our goal.  Once our goal is reached, our funds will be sent to the American Red Cross Disaster Relief program that has been set up.  

 Any little bit helps.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

As many of you may already know, there are other ways to donate if you would rather donate to those causes.  The American Red Cross, Food Banks, and the Salvation Army are all accepting monetary donations.

story:
Hello! For those of you who don't know me, my name is Richard McGuire and I am currently a senior studying Biology at Oberlin College. Oral health is one of the most neglected areas of the public health sector and personal hygiene and this is something I'm passionate about changing. I spent last January in Ondangwa, Namibia researching dental care awareness/access. In my spare time, I taught children about the importance of dental care at a local center for orphans and vulnerable children. From my research, there was an evident correlation between educational background, income, and dental awareness. Click here to read more about my experience!

In China, there is approximately one dentist for every 82,295 people. To compare, in the United States there are roughly 2,2792 people per dentist. And unfortunately in China, over 55.3% of people in the 6-19 year age bracket are affected by dental caries. The aim of my fourth winter term project at Oberlin is to further research the causation of socioeconomic and geographical factors that affect people’s dental awareness and care throughout the greater area of Beijing, China. My research will primarily include interviews with several Chinese nationals on their experiences and knowledge. Although language barriers limit me to the English speaking demographic, I still hope to gain insight on others. I also hope to volunteer with a local program for children informing dental care in some capacity.

While dental health and access is improving overall, there is still much to be done to prevent and control dental diseases. My research will aid in my long-term desire to study dental public health. This experience also paves the way for my aspirations to start a dental nonprofit, helping people understand the importance of proper dental/oral care and the implications of improper care. 

As of now, the total cost of the trip comes out to around $1,700 including airfare, food, and other transportation costs. Not so bad right!? Unfortunately, this project is currently being funded solely through personal funds. Your financial support is quintessential to my success and I would be most grateful for any funds you are able to donate! I understand that not everyone can contribute donations, but don't hesitate to help spread the word! 

Thank you for being such a great support

Sincerely, 

Richard McGuire

funds you are able to donate! I understand that not everyone can contribute donations,
but don't hesitate to help spread the word! Thank you for being such a great supportSincerely, Richard McGuire

story: My name is Tammy Mardo I am Reggie's Grandmother. Reggie is 7 years old and was born with multiple disabilities. Reggie has quadriplegic cerebral palsy, his hearing is impaired and he has a eating disorder to name a few. He is confined to a wheel chair and requires assistance with everything that he needs and likes to do. I have been told by doctors that children with the type of disabilities that Reggie has often only live until the age of 12. I am setting up this fund in hopes that the money donated will help to give Reggie the best life possible while he is here with us. I have done alot of benefits for him here in Rochester and have used those funds to help get things such as a handicap accesible van and medical equipment not covered by insurance. Also R-news here in Rochester has done a story on Reggie in the past and legends radio station as well, both stories aired in March 2012. So please feel free to look on their website or contact them if you need any further information or verification. I appreciate everyone's help in advance, thank you for helping me give my granson the best life he can possibly have.

story:
My Goal

After many years of sedentary living and with my 40s fast approaching, I felt like time was slipping away.  I felt old. I felt sorry for myself.  So I started running, loving it, lost 30lbs and now signed up to run my first Triathlon! 


The event is the Malibu Triathlon, which I will be running on September 18th 2011.  My friend Toby signed me up, through his work so I will be running as part of the Paramount team.


The event has a fundraising aspect raising money for the Children's Hospital in Los Angeles and I also wanted to raise money for Lupus, so I thought I would combine them into one Indie-Go-Go campaign.


Please support my goal to raise money for these two worthy causes, and lend me your emotional support too!  I'm pretty comfortable with the running and biking part but everyone says the open water swim is the hardest part! :-)

The Donations

LA Children's Hospital

LA Children's Hospital is one of the countries oldest hospital dedicated purely to the health and well-being of children.  It is constantly rated amongst the highest in pediatric hospitals and has a dedicated research institute that is leading research on leukemia, neuroscience, diabetes and obesity amongst children.


It is also the primary hospital in the LA County region for children that need life saving care. Last year over 62,000 children passed through its Emergency Department.  Your contribution can help make a difference in the lives of children that pass through this hospital at a time of great need.


Lupus Foundation of America

Lupus is a chronic auto-immune disease where natural anti-bodies attack the healthy cells in your body. It can damage skin, joints and/or organs, and is a disease that fluctuates between flaring up and remission.


Over 5 million people around the world are believed to have Lupus.  It strikes predominantly women of child-bearing age (15-44).  Women of color are 2-3 times more vulnerable to the disease.


There is currently no known cure for Lupus.


The Lupus Foundation of America is a non-profit that was founded in 1977 with the goal of helping find a cure for this disease.  In addition to supporting worldwide research, it strives to increase public awareness and provides support for people with Lupus and there families.

Why Lupus?

My sister-in-law is one of my favorite people on the planet.  2 years ago she was diagnosed with Lupus.  As someone that was always very active and career oriented, the debilitating effects of Lupus were severe.  Despite various knock-backs, she has been an inspiration in how to not take something like this lying down.


This year, she ran her first Marathon, running the London Marathon to raise money for Lupus.  In fact her amazing spirit was what inspired me to start running and training for the Triathlon.


In dedication to Janine, I am running the Malibu Triathlon for the amazing strong people like her that are living with this disease, in the hope that the contribution we all make can some day lead to a cure.


Please join me in showing your support and make whatever donation you feel comfortable making!

Thankyou! :-)

What I Need

So my overall fundraising goal is $1,000.

Please feel free to contribute the amount that feels good for you.

The suggested range of donation is $10, $50 or $100.


Here is a list of how the fundraising will be distributed.


$500 - This is the amount that I will be donating to the LA Children's Hospital.


$500 - This is the amount that will be donated to Lupus Foundation of America


If I can beat my fundraising goal, then I will also use some of the additional money to purchase a starter WetSuit.


What you receive

So this is a little different as its a pure charity run.  What I can offer is the joy of giving and karmic reward.  I will also send all you who donates a personal email thanking you and an update once I have competed in the event.


I will also share photographs and a journal from the big day.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to make a donation, (or even if you are!) please feel free to pass this on to your friends and anybody who you think may be interested in donating.


Thankyou!
